name: Lapse (itch) (Prystic)
description:
Summoned in a tower. The hero is given missions from the wizard asking for his aid.

The wizard can provide you weaponry, consumables and unique items to help you in combat, but at the cost of your mission time. 

Missions range from eliminating enemies, protecting structures to finding artifacts and rescue missions.

After finishing all the missions, the hero learns the wizard's true intentions.

Note: Please use the FULL SCREEN feature for better experience .

Best remaining time will be posted on the thread below.

Current Best Time on Stage 1:

Broadsword - 37s

Default Sword - 62s

Sword and Shield - 24s

Github Link:

https://github.com/DanielTala/Lapse.git
